metadata.synopsis: You have agreed to summon ogres up to three times for the to help you in battle. These are the leader's conversation with you each time. THis is... complicated because there could be many deals in play.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 13.39, 32.93, 381.38 (Inside the school building)4. Speak to Lump, convince him to work for you. He will give player a horn.5. Trigger a battle (anywhere will do)6. Use the horn to summon the ogres.7. killcombat8. After battle is done, Lump will approach player to initiate dialog

26.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
26.text: Well that's that! I've but one last battle in me.
26.context: NodeContext: ‘A feast for the ages then!’ Lump lifting his arms up just above shoulder height, then lowering them to clutch his belly in anticipation of the food he will eat.

77.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
77.context: NodeContext: ‘A feast for the ages then!’ Lump lifting his arms up just above shoulder height, then lowering them to clutch his belly in anticipation of the food he will eat.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: Agreed. I'll have need of you again. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54]).
100.context: NodeContext: ‘A feast for the ages then!’ Lump lifting his arms up just above shoulder height, then lowering them to clutch his belly in anticipation of the food he will eat.

36.speaker: Lump the Enlightened

113.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
113.text: Call when you're ready, my morsel - and not a moment before.
113.context: NodeContext: ‘And not a moment before, lump holds his gaze on the player as he turns his back to leave.

76.text: My battles aren't done. Hold out until the next, and it'll be worth your while. ([5dac5eea-faeb-459c-b675-46c51519b784])

80.text: I'm calling your bluff. Pay up. Now.

74.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
74.text: So our terms have concluded, my little morsel. But there's one last favour I might ask:
74.context: NodeContext: Arms reaching out, almost as if he is stretching and tired of the situation. ‘But theres one…’ his head tilts with his proposal.

7.speaker: Lump the Enlightened

138.speaker: Player

35.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
35.text: Is gold not the pilot of our world-vessel? I am a proud glutton - and not just for meat.
35.context: NodeContext: Lump gestures with his hands to the world around him.
